name: Shopping Mall – Girls Fashion Game
description:
Come girls! let’s get some fashion shopping from fashion store. Enjoy shopping in this new fashion shopping mall girls fashion game. This is the best girls fashion shopping game in all shopping mall games and supermarket girls shopping games. This girls fashion game is the right choice of fashion shopping mall games lovers. You can also act as a cashier and maintain cash register of dress shopping in this cashier game. This girls shopping mall girls fashion game is very amazing in among all fashion shopping games and cashier games in kids shopping games category. 

Girls shopping mall fashion games are very famous shopping games in girls games and kids games. Girls fashion games are basically dress shopping games having variety of latest designs dresses. So, come for the shopping and dress up with new style dresses. Shopping mall girls games give you idea of modern dresses, wardrobes, outfits and accessories. Try different designer dresses and buy all you want in this girls fashion game.

Game Features: 
* You will found variety of Designers dresses in fashion store game.
* Huge color scheme of dresses provided in this dress shopping game.
* Stunning graphics of 3D shopping mall and realistic fashion game.
* Also act as a counter cashier in this supermarket girls shopping mall girls fashion game.
* Different levels of this girls shopping game.

Come to the fashion store in this shopping mall girls fashion game. Choose your favorite dress and try that before you buy it. This fashion game gives you the variety of colorful dresses. So, come girls and try this girls fashion game and have a lot of fun.
